text: Hettikamkanamge Chrishantha Dilan Perera (born 19 September 1978) is a Sri Lankan professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2004.FIFA. "Sri Lanka: Referees". He refereed some matches in AFC Champions League. ==AFC Asian Cup== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:1em auto 1em auto; text-align:center; font-size:small;" ! colspan="4" | 2019 AFC Asian Cup – United Arab Emirates |- !
